resources.string: This application contains everything I\'ve learned, the list below sends the user to different activities that works like a showcase.
This activity shows different types of buttons and their uses. \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
This activity shows a simple TextView which can\'t be edited by the user and a editText where the user can type. \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
This activity allows the user to type a text and send to another activity by pressing "send". \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
This activity shows an example of Alert Dialog when the user press the button \"Alert Dialog\". \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
This activity shows an example of SeekBar which change the text of the TextView below to inform it's position. \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
This activity shows a simple media player controlled by the buttons below. \n \nTo return, tap the return button or tap your phone \"back\" button.
